Are lobsters invertebrates?	Yes

Are lobsters kosher?	No
Are lobsters kosher?	No
Do lobsters have blue blood?	yes

How many legs do lobsters have?	10.

Where are lobsters found?	In all oceans.

What is the mean level of mercury in American lobsters?	0.31 ppm

Do lobsters feel pain?	yes.

Did the Moche people worship lobsters?	yes.

What is the caridoid escape reaction?	Swimming backwards quickly by curling and uncurling their abdomen.
What is the caridoid escape reaction?	When lobsters swim backwards quickly by curling and uncurling their abdomen
